title: 04/12/2021 - DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/12/2021 - DPS Best Of
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan & the Danettes, and they're talking about Jadaveon Clowney's possible move to Cleveland, the teams that need QB's in the 2021 NFL Draft, the takeaways from the Lakers win over the Nets, and Ric Bucher joins the show for all the latest out of the NBA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
